title: Executive Order 7282-Revocation of Executive Order No. 5920, of September 15, 1932, Withdrawing Public Lands, New Mexico
content: By virtue of and pursuant to the authority vested in me by the act of June 25, 1910, ch. 421, 36 Stat. 847, as amended by the act of August 24, 1912, ch. 369, 37 Stat. 497, Executive Order No. 5920, of September 15, 1932, withdrawing public lands in Tps. 21 and 22 S., R. 3 E. of the New Mexico principal meridian, New Mexico, pending a resurvey, is hereby revoked.
This order shall become effective upon the date of the official filing of the plats of resurvey of said townships.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 7282-Revocation of Executive Order No. 5920, of September 15, 1932, Withdrawing Public Lands, New Mexico Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/362780
